remarks.format: ## Remarks 未绑定必需的自变量会导致设计时显示验证错误。Required arguments that are unbound result in validation errors that are displayed at design time. 设置为`true`如果应用于自变量。The is set to `true` if the is applied to an argument. 可通过 对参数设置重载组。Overload groups can be set on arguments through the .

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否需要将 绑定到一个值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the is required to be bound to a value.

value.span: 如果需要将 绑定到一个值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is required to be bound to a value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要某个参数，但其未绑定到一个值，则当包含的活动准备执行时，会引发 ，除非使用了重载组并且绑定了某个重载组的必需参数。If an argument is required and not bound to a value a is thrown when the containing activity is prepared for execution, unless overload groups are used and the required arguments of an overload group are bound. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取此 所属的重载组的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of the overload groups that this belongs to.
A list of overload group names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将自变量组合到一起以形成有效的重载组。Arguments can be grouped together to form valid overload groups. 标识此参数所属的重载组。 identifies the overload groups to which this argument belongs. 重载组不能为另一个重载组的子集或等价集。An overload group cannot be a subset or an equivalent set of another overload group. 当子集仅包含 为 `false` 的参数时例外，这是此规则的唯一例外情况。The only exception to this rule is a subset that contains only arguments where is `false`. 重载组可以重叠，但如果组的交集包含一个或两个重载组的所有必需自变量，则会出错。Overload groups can overlap but it is an error if the intersection of the groups contains all the required arguments of one or both the overload groups. 如果重载组中的所有 参数均被绑定，则该组将被视为绑定的重载组。An overload group is considered bound if all the arguments in the group are bound. 如果一个组具有零个 参数且至少有一个参数被绑定，则该组将被视为绑定的组。If a group has zero arguments and at least one argument bound, then the group is considered bound. 如果没有绑定任何组，除非其中的一个重载组中未包含任何 参数，否则将会出错。It is an error if none of the groups are bound unless one overload group has no arguments in it. 不允许绑定多个重载组中的 参数。Binding arguments from more than one overload group is not permitted. 绑定多个重载组（即，绑定一个重载组中的所有必需自变量，并同时绑定另一个重载组中的所有自变量）的做法是错误的。It is an error to have more than one overload group bound, that is, all required arguments in one overload group are bound and any argument in another overload group is also bound. 对先前规则的任何违反都会导致在包含的活动准备执行时引发 。Any violation of the preceding rules results in a being thrown when the containing activity is prepared for execution. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .
